dcterms:creator: Ralph G Andrzejak
Klaus Lehnertz
Florian Mormann
Christoph Rieke
Peter David
Christian E Elger
dcterms:description: The Bonn dataset consists of five distinct collections of EEG signals, each containing 100 single-channel EEG segments lasting 23.6 seconds, derived from continuous multi-channel EEG recordings. The dataset includes recordings from healthy volunteers and patients post-epilepsy surgery, with specific segments designated for seizure detection.
dcterms:title: Bonn Dataset

dcterms:creator: PhysioToolkit PhysioBank
dcterms:description: The CHB-MIT dataset features EEG recordings from pediatric patients diagnosed with intractable seizures, observed over multiple days after discontinuation of anti-seizure medications. The dataset includes recordings from 24 subjects, with tracks labeled for seizure activity.
dcterms:title: CHB-MIT Dataset
